title: Romanian Hub Used By U.S. Military Is In A Strategic Location
teaser: There are 30,000 U.S. troops in Afghanistan and 20,000 will head home shortly. Millions of them transited in and out through a base in Kyrgyzstan, until the government there didn't renew the lease.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
